lines: 3m medical materials 1567 polyester double coated tape
suitable for attaching devices to nonwoven fabric and/or plastic surfaces
material and / or technology for health care or medical device construction
this double sided medical tape on a roll (1567) consists of a 1 mil transparent polyester backing, coated on two sides with a pressure sensitive synthetic rubber adhesive

the liner is a two sided silicone treated, bleached kraft glassine paper
